title: Chat and Co-Browsing Strategies to Enhance Educational Effectiveness in Virtual Reference Services

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic digital communication tools and foundational knowledge in a specialized field (medicine/law/technology)
context.additional_context: Learners are professionals with advanced domain expertise, focusing on learning real-world applicable educational methods using their own devices (BYOD).

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three effective information delivery methods in chat/IM-based educational environments
Learners can design and execute real-time collaborative educational scenarios using co-browsing tools
Learners can identify technical issues in virtual reference services and propose at least two solutions
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
